58253.en:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>MunyuMunyu. My mom went to get some
pills. She's not here right now.<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58253.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「ムニュムニュ……。だ～れ？
　ママなら　クスリをかいにいって
　いまは　いないけど……<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58254.en: <start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>Ah! It's Teeny Sanguini!<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58254.ja: <start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「あーっ！！　モーモンたんだーっ！<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58255.en:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>Wow, wow, wow! I've never seen Teeny
Sanguini this close before! Wow,
amazing!<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58255.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「わーい　わーい！　こんなに　ちかくで
　モーモンたん　みるの　はじめてー！
　すごい　すごーい！<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000002.en:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, hey, girl. Is this Teeny
Sanguini's? Why are you so happy to go
with us?<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000002.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「ねえねえ　おねえちゃん。
　このモーモンたん　おねえちゃんの？
　どうして　つれあるいて　へいきなの？<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000003.en:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, hey, onii-chan. Is this
Teeny Sanguini's? Why are you so happy
to be with us?<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000003.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「ねえねえ　おにいちゃん。
　このモーモンたん　おにいちゃんの？
　どうして　つれあるいて　へいきなの？<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000004.en:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>I see. You're a Monster Master, aren't
you? How cool!<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000004.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「……へえ～。おねえちゃん
　まものつかいっていう　おしごとしてるのね。
　なんか　かっこいいー！<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000005.en:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>I see. So you're a Monster Master,
huh? How cool!<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000005.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「……へえ～。おにいちゃん
　まものつかいっていう　おしごとしてるのね。
　なんか　かっこいいー！<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58258.en: <start_lip_sync n02295 _normal m00001>Kaya, I'm home. Be good.<stop_lip_animation n02295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58258.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02295 _normal m00001>「カーヤ。ただいまー。
　いい子に　して……<stop_lip_animation n02295 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58259.en:
Geeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! MONSTER Yooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
ooooooooooooooooooooooo!
58259.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02295 _normal m00001>「ぎゃーーーーーーーーッ！！
　魔物よーーーーーッ！！<stop_lip_animation n02295 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58260.en: <start_lip_sync n02295 _normal m00001>Kaya! It's not safe! Stay back!<stop_lip_animation n02295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58260.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02295 _normal m00001>「カーヤ！　危険だわ！
　下がってなさい！<stop_lip_animation n02295 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58261.en: <start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>No, Mom. She's...<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58261.ja: <start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「ママ　ちがうの。このコはね……<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58262.en:
You're the one who put this monster in my room! What the hell are you doing? Take your monster and get the hell out
of here!
58262.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02295 _normal m00001>「この魔物を　部屋に入れたのは　あなたね！？
　いったい　どういうつもり？
　魔物を連れて　さっさと出ていってちょうだい！<stop_lip_animation n02295 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000006.en: <start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>Sorry. Hey, girl.<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000006.ja: <start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「ごめんね……。おねえちゃん……。<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000007.en: <start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>Sorry. Hey, Onii-chan.<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000007.ja: <start_lip_sync n02294 _normal m00001>「ごめんね……。おにいちゃん……。<stop_lip_animation n02294 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58265.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>The way he swings his sword is
becoming quite handsome.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58265.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「いいぞ　ファーベル！
　剣を振る姿が　なかなか　サマになってきた。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58266.en: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Okay, let's take a break here.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58266.ja: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「よし　この辺で　ひと息入れよう。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58267.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>You. We met inside my house before,
didn't we? Did I say <pc>?<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58267.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「アンタ……。
　前に　ウチの中で　会ったよな。
　たしか　<pc>って言ったっけ？<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58268.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Ha-ha-ha. You're the monster master my
mom asked for, right?<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58268.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「ハハァン。母さんが頼みごとをした
　まもの使いって　アンタだな？<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58269.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>So, how did it go? Did Mom's plan to
cheer up the girls with Teeny Sanguini
work?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58269.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「それで　どうだった？
　モーモンで　女の子を元気づけるっていう
　母さんの作戦は　うまくいったかい？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58270.en:
Ha-ha-ha! You don't have to answer seriously, I can tell by your dark face. You got turned away and came
back anyway, didn't you?
58270.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「はははっ！　マジメに答えなくても
　その暗い顔を見れば　わかるよ。
　どうせ　追い返されて　帰ってきたんだろう？<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58271.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Monsters are just monsters, and they
deserve to be feared and rejected.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58271.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「魔物は　しょせん　魔物。
　怖がられて　きらわれて……
　それが　当然の存在だよ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58272.en: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Sorry. It seems Fabel was rude.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58272.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「すまない。どうやら　ファーベルが
　失礼なことを言ったみたいだ。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58273.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>I'm sorry I'm late in introducing
myself. I'm Dailer, a traveling
battlemaster.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58273.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「……っと　自己紹介が　遅れたな。
　オレは　デイラー。旅のバトルマスターだ。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58274.en:
I met Fabel a while ago and have been teaching him swordsmanship. Well, it's what you might call a master-student
relationship.
58274.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「少し前に　ファーベルと知り合って
　ヤツに　剣を教えたりしている。
　まあ　いわゆる　師弟関係ってやつだ。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58275.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Fabel seems to have had a rough time
with monsters.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58275.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「ファーベルは……
　どうやら　魔物がらみで
　つらい過去が　あるみたいなんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58276.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>That's why I tend to behave like that
when I see monster masters. Please
tolerate him.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58276.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「だから　まもの使いを見ると
　つい　あんな態度を取ってしまうらしい。
　大目に見てやってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58277.en:
Mr. Dailer. How long are you two going to keep chit-chatting? You're going to the castle today to train, right? Come
on, let's go.
58277.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「デイラーさん。いつまで　おしゃべりしてるの？
　今日は　お城の方まで　修行にいくんでしょ？
　早く　行こうよ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58278.en:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Yeah, that's right! Okay, I'm on my
way! I'll be right there!<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58278.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「ああ　そうだったな！
　わかった！　すぐ行くよ！<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58279.en: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>Well then, we'll be going now.<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58279.ja: <start_lip_sync n02288 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　オレたちは　これで。<stop_lip_animation n02288 CLOSE_MOUTH>
